brief.product_service: Enterprise data encryption and secure collaboration platform for regulated industries
brief.primary_goal: Launch to market with 500 qualified leads, establish thought leadership, and secure 10 enterprise pilots in Q1
brief.target_audience: CISO, VP of Security, and Compliance Officers at financial services and healthcare organizations
brief.positioning_summary: Enterprise-grade security meets user-friendly simplicity - the data encryption platform trusted by regulated industries.
